}} 'The Passage' is a novel by Justin Cronin, published in 2010 by Ballantine
Books, a division of Random House, Inc., New York. The Passage debuted at #3 on
the [[New York Times]] hardcover fiction best seller list, and remained on the
list 7 additional weeks. It is the first novel of
a planned trilogy; the second book ''The Twelve'' was released in 2012, with the
third book The City of Mirrors due to be released in 2014. [http://arts.nationalpost.com/2010/06/15/apocalypse-wow-with-big-
buzz-around-his-dark-new-novel-and-a-movie-deal-under-his-belt-justin-cronin-is-
lits-latest-unlikely-celebrity/ Arts.nationalpost.com]
